title: I WOULD LIKE MY LP BACK PLEASE
body:
I was in the last game of my silver 4 promos to get to silver 3 when my internet just would not let me play the league game anymore. I restarted my router and everything and reconnected 20 times but i still was unable to come back. There is no filter for people that just leave games and people that lag out of games. I HAD 1 WIN IN MY PROMOS AND SINCE I DC'D IT KNOCKED ME BACK DOWN TO SILVER 4 WITH 81 LP LEFT. WHAT THE SHIT.  Ive spent the last 3 days power farming games and i get literally nowhere with it. 

If some lovely riot employee could give me my silver 3 i would really appreciate it. {{champion:30}}

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot modify your ranked standing or your LP. The system was designed this way to prevent any abuse of the system, I hope you understand.

While I can't put you back in Silver III, I'm confident you'll get back there with some hard work and determination. As a preventative measure, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are 100% compatible with League.

Let me know if you have any other issues with this.
